thread.section_title: One.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of One.com | www.one.com | 2 of 216
thread.title: suvash biswas

author: suvash biswas
title: suvash biswas
text: Have been using to create web pages. Does take some time to learn how manipulate the templates and in particular, get the Mobile versions to appear as needed. But apart from loosing a little time in the beginning to get used to it but there are many template styles to choose; the most helpful aspect is that there is online chat available to answer technical questions. Most of the agents are good but leaving a comment now after speaking with Lester who was a particular star in sorting a few issues. Would recommend to use One.Com for you Website.
